controls.title: Use Secure Protocols for Remote Access
controls.description: Ensure SSH version 2 and FIPS-approved encryption algorithms are configured instead of insecure protocols like Telnet or HTTP.
controls.check_text: Verify 'ip ssh version 2' and 'ip ssh server algorithm encryption aes256-ctr aes192-ctr aes128-ctr' are present.
controls.fix_text: Configure the device to use FIPS-approved algorithms as per the STIG guidance.
